other_title: 直球表題ロボットアニメ (Japanese)
plot: The story is centered on three robots in the year Mobile Century 8013, a time when humanity has already been wiped out but remaining military robots continue to fight. Three robots, Fuji, Katō, and Mori, stand up to try and put an end to this war that has been going on for over seven millennia.
opening_theme: "Break the War" by Kouhey, Mao, Pour Lui and CHIRO
ending_theme: "Jiyū Toyū Riyū (自由という理由)" by ZAQ
